article_title: Minimum Wage Hike for Thee, but Not for Me
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: Unions asked to be exempt from Los Angeles' $15-per-hour minimum wage, so union workers would earn less and owners would be more likely to allow unions.

og.description: Unions asked to be exempt from Los Angeles' $15-per-hour minimum wage, so union workers would earn less and owners would be more likely to allow unions.
